## running just the six samples with hb classifier on cluster

activate qiime 
```
apptainer exec --bind $PWD:/data --pwd /data /programs/qiime2-2025.10/qiime2_amplicon.sif qiime info
```
```
mkdir sixsamp
```

run:
 ```     
apptainer exec --bind $PWD:/data --pwd /data /programs/qiime2-2025.10/qiime2_amplicon.sif qiime feature-classifier classify-sklearn --i-classifier hbclassifier.qza --i-reads rep-seqs_plate6.qza --o-classification hbtaxonomy.qza
```
```
apptainer exec --bind $PWD:/data --pwd /data /programs/qiime2-2025.10/qiime2_amplicon.sif qiime metadata tabulate --m-input-file hbtaxonomy.qza --o-visualization hbtaxonomy.qzv
```
```
apptainer exec --bind $PWD:/data --pwd /data /programs/qiime2-2025.10/qiime2_amplicon.sif qiime taxa barplot --i-table table_plate1.qza --i-taxonomy hbtaxonomy.qza --m-metadata-file fwpracticemetadata.txt --o-visualization hbbarplot_before_filtering.qzv
```
